metoffice.title: Yellow warning of fog affecting South West England
metoffice.summary: Yellow warning of fog affecting South West England: Bath and North East Somerset, Bournemouth Christchurch and Poole, Dorset, Gloucestershire, Somerset, South Gloucestershire, Swindon, Wiltshire valid from 0615 Thu 02 Oct to 0900 Thu 02 Oct

heat.text: Little impact observed on health, healthcare services and social care provision. Business as usual.

cold.text: Little impact observed on health, healthcare services and social care provision. Business as usual.
